metadata.title: UpdatedInvestigationFlow
metadata.description: This workflow starts automatically on every item update in the SharePoint investigation list
metadata.prerequisites: SharePoint lists for storing Investigations and Tasks. Sentinel integrated with Defender for storing incidents
postDeployment: Assign the role of Microsoft Sentinel Reponder to the workflow's managed identity at the Sentinel resource group or workspace level
Autorize the API for the connection to SharePoint

metadata.description: Enter the Object GUID for the Entra Group representing Tier 3 - NOTE: in this implementation, Tier 3 is the entry level (lower in hierarchy)
Enter the Object GUID for the Entra Group representing Tier 2 - NOTE: in this implementation, Tier 2 is the medium level (medium in hierarchy)
Enter the Object GUID for the Entra Group representing Tier 1 - NOTE: in this implementation, Tier 1 is the entry level (higher in hierarchy)
Enter the URL of the SharePoint site collection hosting the lists for storing Investigations and Tasks
Enter name of the SharePoint list for storing Tasks
Enter name of the SharePoint list for storing Investigations
